newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch closing share market report.
newsitem.headline: Dutch closing share market report.

text.p: Dutch shares moved higher at the open and dealers said option expiry this afternoon could boost prices further.
"Option expiry could bring some volatility in the market, but the impact is expected to be positive," said one dealer.
The AEX share index gained 3.05 points to 859.64 after half an hour of trade. Steel firm Hoogovens and Unilever strong.

"The market is expecting another report from Goldman Sachs on Hoogovens with a price target for the stock that is higher than the 105 guilders they had forecast before," said one dealer. Hoogovens gained 3.60 guilders to 111.70.
